Name: Pandemonium
About the game: Join two kindred spirits, Fargus the Jester and Nikki the acrobat in a fantastic 3D world of magic and mystery as they bounce, tumble and jump through 18 massive and diverse levels in search of the Wishing Engine! Key Features: Fast-paced 3D platform action in a lush, texture-mapped environment. Over 18 levels, hilarious power-ups, tons of secrets, huge bosses and shape-change from a bull-dozing rhino to a fire-blasting dragon. A totally immersive experience complete with beautiful soundtrack and cinematics.
Meta Title: Pandemonium: Oct 8, 2013, Crystal Dynamics and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Pandemonium? Check out the release date (Oct 8, 2013), developer insights from Crystal Dynamics, and a complete game summary.
